description_html:
The Terra Rug Series reflects the purity and clarity of our natural environment. This hand-tufted rug collection is rooted in nature and made to the highest standards. This rug's rich, complex and painterly veining is drawn directly from a slab of marble. The stately, solid character of Calacatta or Arabescato marble rendered in wool and silk.

Hand-tufted with fine, long fiber, New Zealand wool and dull silk. Pile height at wool is 1/2" and pile height at silk is 5/8" and 120 knots per square inch.
